markdown:
| icon           = poe2 scroll_of_wael icon.png
| description    = This stitched-together approximation of a map points the way to a remote island. Illustrations of squat huts and the name "Junvik Village" stand out with prominence. The northern coast, however, is adorned with the scribbled likeness of a skull. Spidery lettering encircles the landmass to spell out the name "Drowned Barrows."

Merely holding the parchment fills you with a sense of dread. When you run your thumb over the skull, your pulse quickens like the beating of a drum.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Quest item

| location       = * Assembled from four separate map pieces, dropped by each of the targets of the bounties given to you by [Dessiral](/dessiral/). The map was split and given to each of the crew members for safe keeping after the ''Firebrand'' was disbanded.
| guid           = 0e9f2036-f9f6-4067-995e-aa23a2d1e1bb
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## =Treasure

=
The map leads to Captain Henqua's treasure, a location that appears west of [Junvik Village](/junvikVillage/) after assembling the map. It contains:
* 20x [Golden Suole](/currencyGoldenSuole/) ({{cp2|180}})
* 56x [Silver Lusce](/currencySilverLusce/) ({{cp2|168}})
* 270x [Copper Pand](/currencyCopperPand/) 
* [Emerald](/emeraldDeadfire/), [Black Pearl](/blackPearl/), [Ruby](/rubyDeadfire/)
* [Magnera's Chain](/magnerasChain/)

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

== Description ==
{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

== Acquisition ==
{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

===Treasure===
The map leads to Captain Henqua's treasure, a location that appears west of [[Junvik Village]] after assembling the map. It contains:
* 20x [[Currency#Golden Suole|Golden Suole]] ({{cp2|180}})
* 56x [[Currency#Silver Lusce|Silver Lusce]] ({{cp2|168}})
* 270x [[Currency#Copper Pand|Copper Pand]] 
* [[Emerald (Deadfire)|Emerald]], [[Black Pearl]], [[Ruby (Deadfire)|Ruby]]
* [[Magnera's Chain]]
title: Captain Henqua's Treasure Map
